type.name: section
type.title: Short title.  PART I PROCLAMATION OF DISTRICTS
type.context: DISTRICT GOVERNMENT ACT under Short title.  PART I PROCLAMATION OF DISTRICTS  1. This Act may be cited as the District Government Act.   PART I PROCLAMATION OF DISTRICTS
type.description: This Act may be cited as the District Government Act.   PART I PROCLAMATION OF DISTRICTS

type.name: section
type.title: Establishment of administrative districts.
type.context: DISTRICT GOVERNMENT ACT under Establishment of administrative districts. 2. (1) The Minister may by order declare and establish in any part of Guyana a district (hereinafter described as the district) to be administered in the manner hereinafter mentioned.  (2) The order shall set forth the boundaries of the LAWS OF GUYANA 4 Cap. 19:02 District Government                 North Western district.         district.   (3) The Minister may from time to time, by order, extend, or reduce, or otherwise alter, the limits of the district.

description.description: The Minister may by order declare and establish in any part of Guyana a district
The order shall set forth the boundaries of the LAWS OF GUYANA 4 Cap. 19:02 District Government                 North Western district.         district.
The Minister may from time to time, by order, extend, or reduce, or otherwise alter, the limits of the district.
